name: Jumpman Mango
description:
Play as Mango Mario, the complete rip-off realest mario who has ever lived.

After witnessing all the love and attention Mario was getting on a daily basis, Mango Mario (mmm for short) plots his revenge to exterminate the pest formally known as mario. 

In this game you can jump and walk to the side as Mario Jumpman Mango Mario

Jumpman Mango Mario is in no way, shape or form, affiliated with the vegetable kown as "Mango" it's a complete coincidence, honest.

Keywords: Mango Mario, Mario, Lucario, Videogame

Mario sprites made by: MollyChan (https://www.spriters-resource.com/submitter/MollyChan/)
